AlreadyAppliedException - Exception Class in com.dreamwork.exception
Custom exception thrown when a user trys to apply for a job that they have already applied for.

Constructs a new AlreadyAppliedException with the specified detail message.

This method allows to apply for a job ad with CV file.

Security configuration class to define the security settings of the application.
